attributes.title: 🤢eww
attributes.review: A friend recommended that I download the app to support daddy orange 💖 but once I got it it was really bad. It was extremely glitchy and slow. The amount of issues I’ve had with this app are too much to handle. It’s disgusting 🤢. I wish I had something good to say , but I think that’s impossible. I really don’t recommend it.

attributes.title: gimme my nude sexy pres 🤩
attributes.review: i am completely devastated by this app. i was trying to educate myself on this app about our 🍊 presidente but all i got was notifications and news and stuff and it broke my phone 😔! also, when i tried to forward a picture of trump nude to my eight year old step sister, they sent a picture of the teletubbies instead 🙈✨ my sister cried and i want a new phone and my picture back 🦇😠 trump needs to make changes on this app because its trash and i dont appreciate seeing trump in his keep america great swimking trumps as the loading screen 👁👄👁🕺🏽🥵😍🥰🙈✨✨✨

attributes.title: 0/5 Don’t recommend ✨🧚🏼‍♂️🥰
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it asked me for money so I closed it but I forgot to delete it and a couple minutes later the Secret Service showed up at my house asking for a small loan of a million dollars. EXCUSE ME. Nope. I was not having it. As soon as I deleted the app the disappeared right in front of my eyes. Weird.

attributes.title: ✨hail trump XD
attributes.review: wow after coming from the camps, i was instructed to download this app to once again, please our notorious ruler of white supremacy, TRUMP ☺️ but after downloading it i suddenly felt like abusing my hispanic cousin and disowning my LGBTQ+ friends :( and it was such horrible feeling!!!! i quickly had the idea of reviewing this app but didn’t see the negative star section 😔 #𝓪𝓬𝓪𝓫 𝟙𝟛𝟙𝟛

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app has given me type one diabetes✨. I opened it and then my phone exploded and Elmo proceeded to go forward with a home invasion in my small southern home. I tried to go to sleep but then this app set an alarm and called in a swat team into my home and killed my hamster. This app single handedly poisoned all of my food and destroyed my soul. I love it, no I don’t ❤️

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and the first thing it told me to do was microwave my dog. Knowing that Trump always has the best ideas and solutions, like hydroxychloroquine, I did it. My dog did not like it at all and I never received the free gift I was promised😡 I am very upset and would like a new dog because my stinks up the whole house with her melting skin.

To start off the app itself takes what feels like a whole day to download. The reason i was downloading this app was because I decided to educate my self on the person we call our president. Not many people like him and i can definitely see why. The app is slow and I HATE IT🧚🏾✨🌸 anyways have a good day :)

attributes.title: genZ
attributes.review: First, when i first opened it the phrase “keep America great” showed up as if America was ever really great. Make America great again is the same as make white and not all lives matter again. For this, the app should get deleted until there is a black lives matter sign posted somewhere on the sight. Keep living a humble life and vote !!!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with important events, see what rallies I can go to, campaigns I could help with, but this darn app won’t even let me make an account! I tried putting in my phone number, but it says it’s incorrect! I don’t want to wait for newspapers about upcoming events! I need corporate’s number!

attributes.title: terrible app.
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i am still unsure of who to vote for this upcoming election, but now i am more than sure who i will be voting for! this app is terrible with a gross and very distracting layout and is constantly crashing! very disappointed! i will NOT vote for a president who doesn’t adhere to actually using proper technology.
